catch_line: Coexistence With Other Available Relief For Specific Deprivations Of Protected Rights.
full_text:
COEXISTENCE WITH OTHER AVAILABLE RELIEF FOR SPECIFIC DEPRIVATIONS OF PROTECTED RIGHTS.

	This article shall not be construed to limit a Hotel Worker’s right to bring legal action for violation of other minimum compensation laws.

7.catch_line: Coexistence With Other Available Relief For Specific Deprivations Of Protected Rights.

dublin_core.Title: Coexistence With Other Available Relief For Specific Deprivations Of Protected Rights.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

COEXISTENCE WITH OTHER AVAILABLE RELIEF FOR SPECIFIC DEPRIVATIONS OF PROTECTED
RIGHTS. (§ 184.07)

  COEXISTENCE WITH OTHER AVAILABLE RELIEF FOR SPECIFIC DEPRIVATIONS OF
PROTECTED RIGHTS.	This article shall not be construed to limit a Hotel
Worker’s right to bring legal action for violation of other minimum
compensation laws.
